message: {{#is_alert}} {{env.name}} is seeing an unusual number of sign-in attempts from the student mobile app. Did someone ship a build pointed to staging?{{/is_alert}}  @slack-incidents-students,@slack-errors-core
name: Too many sign-in attempts from Student iOS
query: avg(last_4h):anomalies(avg:trace.rack.request.hits.by_http_status{resource_name:mobile::v2::signincontroller_create,!env:production} by {env}.as_count(), 'agile', 2, direction='above', alert_window='last_15m', interval=60, count_default_zero='true', seasonality='weekly', timezone='america/los_angeles') >= 1
